mapper.insert: insert into video(video_id, video_name, video_releasetime, video_rublisher, video_introduction, video_address, video_audit) values (#{videoId},#{videoName}, #{videoReleasetime},#{videoRublisher},#{videoIntroduction},#{videoAddress}, #{videoAudit})
mapper.select: select count(*) from video where video_id = #{videoId}
